text: (Nampikkaiyāḷarkaḷē!) Uṅkaḷil (uṇmaiyākavē maṉam virumpi) pōr purintavarkaḷ yāreṉpataiyum allāhvaiyum, avaṉuṭaiya tūtaraiyum, nampikkaiyāḷarkaḷaiyum tavira (maṟṟevaraiyum taṅkaḷ) antaraṅka naṇparkaḷāka eṭuttuk koḷḷātavarkaḷ yār eṉpataiyum, allāh (uṅkaḷaic cōtittu) aṟivikkāmal, nīṅkaḷ viṭṭu viṭappaṭuvīrkaḷ eṉṟu eṇṇik koṇṭīrkaḷā? Allāh nīṅkaḷ ceypavaṟṟai naṉkaṟintavaṉ āvāṉ
